Subject: Can heritrix run more than one job at the same time?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=196832670

I notice from the WUI that if there are  more than one pending jobs,
Heritrix will run one by one.I set up many jobs to run every day.
For example, I will want to run 3 jobs at 8:00am from a wraper of heritirx.
Should I set up 3 Heritrix instance or add 3 jobs to ONE instance and let
heritrix run them at same time ?


ansi
